description: This simple pasta recipe made with silky fettuccine and a creamy mushroom and ricotta sauce is a delicious meal the whole family will enjoy.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Lemon,Low sugar,Mushroom,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Vegetarian
name: Creamy Mushroom, Ricotta & Lemon Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 14 minutes or until al dente. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-low heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add garlic and mushrooms, and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until mushrooms are golden and tender.
Add pasta, reserved cooking liquid, lemon zest, half the ricotta and half the parsley, then cook, tossing, for 2 minutes or until a smooth sauce forms.
Top pasta with walnuts, remaining ricotta and remaining parsley. Serve with lemon wedges.
